subject: RE: [junit] Failed to invoke suite(): java.lang.NullPointerExcept	ion
msgSnippet: Make sure you re setting the name of the test in the constructor. [i.e., Call super(name) in your constructor.] Thanks --DP ... From: boyfrnd007
messageBody:
Make sure you're setting the name of the test in the constructor.
[i.e., Call super(name) in your constructor.]


Thanks
--DP

-----Original Message-----
From: boyfrnd007 [mailto:boyfrnd007@...]
Sent: Tuesday, March 16, 2004 12:29 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Failed to invoke suite(): java.lang.NullPointerException


public static TestSuite suite()
{
return new TestSuite GetndSetAlertPropertiesTest.class);
}
This is what my code looks like. I dont know why am i getting this
error. I checked the output folder and it does contain the class
file. I have the same structure for many other files but for some
reason this one is stuck. Any help would be appreciated. Thanks!
Abhishek
